nodes.id: 中华民国军政府鄂军都督府

zh-cn: 中华民国军政府鄂军都督府
中华民国政府湖北都督府

description.zh-cn: 武昌起义成功后于1911年10月11日在湖北武昌成立的革命政权，是中华民国第一个省级军政府，也是历史上最早以“中华民国”为国号的政权，曾代行中央军政府职责。
description.en: A revolutionary regime established in Wuchang, Hubei on October 11, 1911, after the success of the Wuchang Uprising. It was the first provincial military government of the Republic of China, the earliest regime to use 'Republic of China' as its national name, and it once acted as the central military government.

description.zh-cn: 1911年10月10日在中国武昌市爆发的一场旨在推翻清朝统治的兵变，是辛亥革命的开端。
description.en: A military revolt that broke out on October 10, 1911, in Wuchang, China, aimed at overthrowing the Qing dynasty. It marked the beginning of the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个大一统封建王朝，于1911年辛亥革命爆发后覆灭。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of China, which was overthrown following the Xinhai Revolution in 1911.

nodes.id: 中华民国临时政府 (1912年－1913年)

zh-cn: 中华民国临时政府 (1912年－1913年)
en: Provisional Government of the Republic of China (1912–1913)

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命后由革命党人于1912年1月1日在南京成立的临时政府。
description.en: A provisional government established in Nanjing on January 1, 1912, by revolutionaries after the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国清末民初军事和政治人物，武昌起义后被推举为湖北军政府都督，后两度担任中华民国大总统及副总统。
description.en: A Chinese military and political figure in the late Qing dynasty and early Republic of China. He was appointed as the military governor of the Hubei Military Government after the Wuchang Uprising and later served twice as President and Vice President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国晚清至民国初年立宪派、政治人物，曾任湖北省咨议局议长，武昌起义后在湖北军政府担任要职。
description.en: A constitutionalist and political figure from the late Qing to the early Republican era in China. He served as the speaker of the Hubei Provincial Consultative Assembly and held important positions in the Hubei Military Government after the Wuchang Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末年由孙中山等人在日本东京成立的革命组织，旨在推翻清朝，建立共和政体。
description.en: A revolutionary organization founded in Tokyo, Japan, by Sun Yat-sen and others in the late Qing dynasty, aiming to overthrow the Qing dynasty and establish a republic.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代民主革命家、政治家、中华民国国父及中国国民党创党人。武昌起义后被推举为中华民国临时大总统。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, statesman, founding father of the Republic of China, and the founder of the Kuomintang. He was elected as the provisional president of the Republic of China after the Wuchang Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末年“预备立宪”的产物，是湖北省的准议会机构。其大楼在武昌起义后成为鄂军都督府。
description.en: A product of the 'preparatory constitutionalism' in the late Qing Dynasty, serving as a quasi-parliamentary body for Hubei Province. Its building became the headquarters of the Hubei Military Government after the Wuchang Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 同盟会会员，参与筹划武昌起义，并拟定了起义后临时政府的组织。
description.en: A member of the Tongmenghui who participated in the planning of the Wuchang Uprising and drafted the organization of the provisional government after the uprising.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家，参与武昌起义，并在湖北军政府担任要职。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary who participated in the Wuchang Uprising and held important positions in the Hubei Military Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家，共进会领袖，参与发动武昌起义，后在湖北军政府任军务部部长。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, leader of the Gongjinhui, participated in launching the Wuchang Uprising, and later served as the Minister of Military Affairs in the Hubei Military Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家，文学社领袖，武昌起义总指挥，在湖北军政府担任军务部副长。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, leader of the Wenxueshe, commander-in-chief of the Wuchang Uprising, and served as the Deputy Minister of Military Affairs in the Hubei Military Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家，参与武昌起义，并在湖北军政府担任要职。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary who participated in the Wuchang Uprising and held important positions in the Hubei Military Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代革命家、政治家，中华民国初期第一位倡导内阁制的政治家。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary and politician, the first advocate of a cabinet system in the early Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家，参与武昌起义，并为湖北军政府拟订了《军政府暂行条例》。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary and politician who participated in the Wuchang Uprising and drafted the 'Provisional Regulations of the Military Government' for the Hubei Military Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家，参与武昌起义，并在湖北军政府担任要职。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary who participated in the Wuchang Uprising and held important positions in the Hubei Military Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家，参与武昌起义，并在湖北军政府担任要职。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary who participated in the Wuchang Uprising and held important positions in the Hubei Military Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家，武昌起义前夕被捕牺牲的“三烈士”之一。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, one of the 'Three Martyrs' arrested and executed on the eve of the Wuchang Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事人物，武昌起义的领导人之一，后在湖北军政府担任参谋部副部长。
description.en: A Chinese military figure, one of the leaders of the Wuchang Uprising, who later served as Deputy Chief of the General Staff in the Hubei Military Government.

description.zh-cn: 清末新军的建制单位，驻扎湖北，是武昌起义的主要军事力量。
description.en: An organizational unit of the New Army in the late Qing Dynasty, stationed in Hubei, which became the main military force of the Wuchang Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 由孙中山编定的革命纲领性文件，湖北军政府成立时依据其原则精神制定政策。
description.en: A programmatic document for the revolution compiled by Sun Yat-sen, whose principles guided the policies of the Hubei Military Government upon its establishment.

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命后建立的亚洲第一个民主共和国。
description.en: The first democratic republic in Asia, established after the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 由居正等拟订，于1911年10月17日公布的湖北军政府组织法规，规定了政府的四部设置。
description.en: Organizational regulations for the Hubei Military Government, drafted by Ju Zheng and others and promulgated on October 17, 1911, which stipulated the establishment of four departments in the government.

description.zh-cn: 中国法学家、政治人物，参与辛亥革命，在湖北军政府中担任司法部长等职。
description.en: A Chinese jurist and politician who participated in the Xinhai Revolution and served as Minister of Justice and other positions in the Hubei Military Government.

nodes.id: 中华民国鄂军政府改订暂行条例

zh-cn: 中华民国鄂军政府改订暂行条例

description.zh-cn: 为加强革命党人对军政府的领导，于1911年10月25日颁布的修订版组织条例，将政府机构调整为12个部。
description.en: A revised organizational regulation promulgated on October 25, 1911, to strengthen the leadership of revolutionaries in the military government, reorganizing the government structure into 12 departments.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，辛亥革命元老，在湖北军政府担任外交部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician and veteran of the Xinhai Revolution, who served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs in the Hubei Military Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交家、政治家，在湖北军政府担任外交部副部长。
description.en: A Chinese diplomat and politician who served as the Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs in the Hubei Military Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国地质学家、政治家，曾在湖北军政府担任实业部长。
description.en: A Chinese geologist and politician who once served as the Minister of Industry in the Hubei Military Government.

description.zh-cn: 由湖北军政府颁布，是中国历史上第一部以三权分立为原则的政权根本法。
description.en: Promulgated by the Hubei Military Government, it was the first fundamental law of a regime in Chinese history based on the principle of separation of powers.

nodes.id: 各省都督府代表联合会

zh-cn: 各省都督府代表联合会

description.zh-cn: 武昌起义后由各独立省份派代表组成的联合议事机构，为中华民国临时政府的成立起到了重要的领导作用。
description.en: A joint deliberative body formed by representatives from independent provinces after the Wuchang Uprising, which played a significant leadership role in the establishment of the Provisional Government of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代民主革命家，中华民国的开国元勋。
description.en: A modern Chinese democratic revolutionary and a founding father of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国城市，中华民国临时政府成立地。
description.en: A city in China, the place where the Provisional Government of the Republic of China was established.

description.zh-cn: 中国东北地区的少数民族，建立了清朝。武昌起义后，在武昌的满族人遭到屠杀。
description.en: An ethnic minority in Northeast China who founded the Qing Dynasty. After the Wuchang Uprising, the Manchus in Wuchang were massacred.

nodes.id: 辛亥革命武昌起义纪念馆

zh-cn: 辛亥革命武昌起义纪念馆
en: Museum of the Wuchang Uprising of 1911 Revolution

description.zh-cn: 位于湖北省武汉市武昌区，是为纪念辛亥革命武昌首义而建立的纪念馆，馆址为原湖北省咨议局大楼，也是中华民国军政府鄂军都督府旧址。
description.en: Located in Wuchang District, Wuhan, Hubei, it is a memorial hall established to commemorate the Wuchang Uprising of the Xinhai Revolution. Its site is the former Hubei Provincial Consultative Assembly building, which was also the former site of the Wuchang Uprising Military Government of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 发生于中国清末民初的资产阶级民主革命，旨在推翻清朝专制帝制、建立共和政体。
description.en: A bourgeois-democratic revolution in China that took place in the late Qing and early Republican periods, aiming to overthrow the autocratic monarchy of the Qing Dynasty and establish a republic.

relationships.target: 中华民国军政府鄂军都督府

description.zh-cn: 武昌起义成功后，革命党人于1911年10月11日成立了中华民国军政府鄂军都督府。
description.en: After the success of the Wuchang Uprising, revolutionaries established the Wuchang Uprising Military Government of the Republic of China on October 11, 1911.

relationships.target: 武昌起义

description.zh-cn: 武昌起义是在中国同盟会等革命组织的领导下发动的。
description.en: The Wuchang Uprising was launched under the leadership of revolutionary organizations such as the Tongmenghui.

relationships.source: 中华民国军政府鄂军都督府
relationships.target: 清朝

description.zh-cn: 湖北军政府成立后，宣布废除清朝宣统年号，并发布檄文揭露清政府的罪状。
description.en: After its establishment, the Hubei Military Government announced the abolition of the Qing Dynasty's Xuantong era name and issued proclamations exposing the crimes of the Qing government.

relationships.source: 中华民国临时政府 (1912年－1913年)
relationships.target: 中华民国军政府鄂军都督府

description.zh-cn: 随着1912年1月1日中华民国临时政府在南京成立，湖北军政府作为代行中央政府的职责结束，并于同日解散。
description.en: With the establishment of the Provisional Government of the Republic of China in Nanjing on January 1, 1912, the Hubei Military Government's role as the acting central government ended, and it was dissolved on the same day.

relationships.target: 中华民国军政府鄂军都督府

description.zh-cn: 武昌起义后，被革命党人及立宪派共举为湖北军政府都督。
description.en: After the Wuchang Uprising, he was jointly elected as the Military Governor of the Hubei Military Government by revolutionaries and constitutionalists.

relationships.target: 中华民国军政府鄂军都督府

position.zh-cn: 民政总长、政事部长、编辑部长
position.en: Chief of Civil Affairs, Minister of Political Affairs, Minister of Editing

description.zh-cn: 在湖北军政府中担任多个要职，包括民政总长、政事部长和编辑部长。
description.en: Held several important positions in the Hubei Military Government, including Chief of Civil Affairs, Minister of Political Affairs, and Minister of Editing.

relationships.target: 中华民国军政府鄂军都督府

position.zh-cn: 军务部正长、军务部部长
position.en: Head of the Military Affairs Department, Minister of Military Affairs

description.zh-cn: 在湖北军政府中担任军务部部长。
description.en: Served as the Minister of Military Affairs in the Hubei Military Government.

relationships.target: 中华民国军政府鄂军都督府

position.en: Deputy Head of the Military Affairs Department

description.zh-cn: 在湖北军政府原定计划中任军务部副长。
description.en: Was designated as the Deputy Head of the Military Affairs Department in the original plan for the Hubei Military Government.

relationships.target: 中华民国军政府鄂军都督府

description.zh-cn: 在湖北军政府原定计划中任参议部正长。
description.en: Was designated as the Head of the Advisory Department in the original plan for the Hubei Military Government.

relationships.target: 中华民国军政府鄂军都督府

position.zh-cn: 理财部副长、军务部副部长
position.en: Deputy Head of the Finance Department, Deputy Minister of Military Affairs

description.zh-cn: 在湖北军政府中担任军务部副部长等职。
description.en: Served as Deputy Minister of Military Affairs and other roles in the Hubei Military Government.

relationships.target: 中华民国军政府鄂军都督府

position.zh-cn: 政事部副部长、司法部长
position.en: Deputy Minister of Political Affairs, Minister of Justice

description.zh-cn: 在湖北军政府中担任政事部副部长、司法部长。
description.en: Served as Deputy Minister of Political Affairs and Minister of Justice in the Hubei Military Government.

relationships.target: 中华民国军政府鄂军都督府

description.zh-cn: 在湖北军政府中担任实业部长。
description.en: Served as the Minister of Industry in the Hubei Military Government.

relationships.target: 中华民国军政府鄂军都督府

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军政府鄂军都督府设于原湖北省咨议局大楼旧址。
description.en: The Wuchang Uprising Military Government of the Republic of China was established at the former site of the Hubei Provincial Consultative Assembly building.

relationships.target: 中华民国军政府鄂军都督府

description.zh-cn: 湖北军政府根据孙中山编定的《革命方略》的原则精神宣布废除清朝年号，改国号为中华民国。
description.en: The Hubei Military Government, based on the principles of the 'Revolutionary Program' compiled by Sun Yat-sen, abolished the Qing era name and changed the national title to the Republic of China.

relationships.target: 武昌起义

description.zh-cn: 黎元洪原为清军协统，起初激烈反对革命，并曾手刃革命士兵。
description.en: Originally a brigade commander in the Qing army, Li Yuanhong fiercely opposed the revolution at first and had personally killed revolutionary soldiers.

relationships.target: 军政府暂行条例

description.zh-cn: 1911年10月14日，由居正等人拟订了《军政府暂行条例》。
description.en: On October 14, 1911, the 'Provisional Regulations of the Military Government' were drafted by Ju Zheng and others.

relationships.source: 中华民国军政府鄂军都督府
relationships.target: 中华民国临时政府 (1912年－1913年)

description.zh-cn: 湖北军政府最先倡议组织临时政府，并通过组织各省代表会，为南京临时政府的建立作了思想舆论和组织上的准备。
description.en: The Hubei Military Government was the first to propose the organization of a provisional government and made ideological, public opinion, and organizational preparations for the establishment of the Nanjing Provisional Government by organizing the conference of provincial representatives.

relationships.source: 中华民国军政府鄂军都督府
relationships.target: 中华民国鄂州约法

description.zh-cn: 湖北军政府颁布了《中华民国鄂州约法》，这是中国历史上第一部以三权分立为原则的政权根本法。
description.en: The Hubei Military Government promulgated the 'Provisional Constitution of Ezhou, Republic of China', which was the first fundamental law of a regime in Chinese history based on the principle of separation of powers.

relationships.source: 各省都督府代表联合会
relationships.target: 孙中山

description.zh-cn: 1911年12月29日，各省代表选举孙中山为中华民国第一任临时大总统。
description.en: On December 29, 1911, representatives from various provinces elected Sun Yat-sen as the first Provisional President of the Republic of China.

relationships.source: 各省都督府代表联合会
relationships.target: 黎元洪

description.zh-cn: 1912年1月3日，各省代表选举黎元洪为临时副总统。
description.en: On January 3, 1912, representatives from various provinces elected Li Yuanhong as the Provisional Vice President.

relationships.target: 中华民国临时政府 (1912年－1913年)
中华民国临时政府 (1912年－1913年)

relationships.source: 中华民国军政府鄂军都督府
relationships.target: 满族

description.zh-cn: 武昌起义后，湖北军攻入城内对满人进行了血腥屠杀，据估计约有800人被杀。
description.en: After the Wuchang Uprising, the Hubei army entered the city and carried out a bloody massacre of the Manchus, with an estimated 800 people killed.

relationships.source: 中华民国军政府鄂军都督府
relationships.target: 辛亥革命武昌起义纪念馆

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命武昌起义纪念馆设在中华民国军政府鄂军都督府的旧址。
description.en: The Museum of the Wuchang Uprising of 1911 Revolution is located at the former site of the Wuchang Uprising Military Government of the Republic of China.
